definition: water screen (screen formed of sprayed water droplets, used for displaying projected images, for temperature control, or for air purification)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
curtain or screen/canopy or tent/headquarters of a general/act (of a play)

sentences.english: Datang Furong Garden is the main water-screen movie night, the well-known.
sentences.chinese: 大唐芙蓉园主要是晚上的水幕电影出名。

sentences.english: The application and principles of artificial water curtain are studied.
sentences.chinese: 论述了人工水幕的应用及原理。

sentences.english: Waterscreen Film in Xi'an Tang Paradise is a great show.
sentences.chinese: 西安大唐芙蓉园的水幕电影是非常好的表演。

sentences.english: Li Xiang also said, the water curtain movie fountain performance was with Yancheng characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 李想还介绍说，水幕电影喷泉表演也很有盐城特色。

sentences.english: In the present paper the application of the water curtain system of box type in the underground construction is presented.
sentences.chinese: 箱型水幕系统是用于地下建筑的消防系统之一。

sentences.english: Its square shape and the water moat around it reflect the layout of the Forbidden City.
sentences.chinese: 其方形与外立面的水幕设计反映了紫禁城的布局。

definition: stream of water (as from a fountain or a faucet)/jet of water
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
in Daoism, astral wind on which immortals may ride/strong wind
